revised_title: Magnetic and Physical Properties of Nickel Steel
tldr: This study investigates the magnetic and physical properties of nickel steel, an alloy containing 25% nickel and 74% iron. The research shows that the material can exist in two states, magnetic and non-magnetic, with different electrical resistances and mechanical strengths. The non-magnetic state has a lower specific resistance and is softer, while the magnetic state has a higher breaking stress and hardness. The potential applications and implications of this material are discussed.
